description: Detects all actions taken by Windows Defender malware detection engines Author: Ján Trenčanský. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Windows Defender Threat Detected
query: (winlog.channel:"Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational" AND winlog.event_id:("1006" OR "1116" OR "1015" OR "1117"))
